This release version is outdated! Find the current version
here
.
Release LTS.465.13 of October 29, 2025
New features
Storage of
user unsaved data
now considers expression recalculations/auto-calculation and can be configured per specified visual instance.
Browser back buttons support for navigating previously visited hierarchy levels in
tile registries
was added. A top-level object list navigation button was added to the registry control panel.
The
"Button" widget
settings was improved, and it can now be used as a template when creating
custom widgets
.
For the "ETL object" type, permission control was changed to "System Permission Control". The "Run" privilege was added for
launching ETL processes
via system buttons.
Creating and managing
main menu items
become simpler and more convenient.
Secret variables
are now stored in the main database by default.
Additional parameters for PostgreSQL session configuration when setting up database connections was added.
There is a new convenient way to save important messages, files and notes in a
"Saved messages" chat
.
Changes and improvements
Automatic generation of object type table names and attribute field names was enhanced.
Object deleting mechanism was improved for cases with dependent objects that the user lacks access permissions for.
Creating filter via parameter action menu was added for "Object parameters. Filter" type objects.
The default value for the "Expanded by default" attribute in
main menu settings
was set to "No".
In new objects after saving, the process of switching between
tabs
was debugged.
Highlighting required attributes and displaying object attribute values referencing the default
"Hierarchical registry"
object type was enhanced when working with objects in registry
edit mode
.
Data filtering with dynamic type shift was stabilized when using
custom registry filters
and switching filter types.
Image resizing functionality for thumbnails in
virtual registry columns
was stabilized.
Registry display was stabilized according to specified column widths.
Settings opening functionality was fixed for
"Task Registry"
type, and an assignee selection element was added to its control panel.
The display of numerical values and aggregation for chained attributes in registries and child attributes was debugged.
Hiding an area containing user-invisible parameters settings was enhanced on object visual.
Date filtering capability in the
"Explorer" widget
was fixed.
The display of values in the table presented via the
"Dashboard"
widget was stabilized.
The operation of the
lock algorithm
for the
"Button"
widget was adjusted.
Dashboards now support data filtering in the
"Table" analytical panel
when used as a
drill-down panel
.
Overriding standard actions with
batch actions
was stabilized.
Execution of
custom button actions
placed in child attributes added via frame to related type visuals was fixed.
Creating
object chats
via business process algorithms was fixed.
The operation of the
contextObjAttr
function with chained context-type attributes was adjusted.
The performance of
visibility algorithms
using the
alg
function was optimized.
Configuration settings for
condition trees
were improved.
Permission verification for executing
data sources
was improved.
Access permissions for creating and deleting
menu items
using registry control panel buttons were adjusted.
Number of System security improvements were implemented.
The cyclicity check when creating a business process was improved.
The process of
ETL execution
from a file was debugged.
Before starting the ETL, the ability to open a modal dialog for parameter input was stabilized.
The operation of the "Search for an object in the registry" type transformer was debugged.
Installation of updates containing
business process templates
was optimized.
Access group deleting capability was fixed when specified
privilege levels
are set.
The list of user errors sent to system administrators via email was adjusted.
The ability to add users to
System access groups
was stabilized.
Cache clearing was improved when saving
security principal privileges
.
The performance of
balance checks
was optimized.
User lock/unlock process was fixed based on Microsoft Active Directory data.
Database size display was fixed for
SaaS solutions
.
Data synchronization with Microsoft Active Directory
was improved. It is now performed only during the userâ€™s first login with a domain account.
The display and saving of
secret variables
in the specified
directory
was stabilized.
The change saving process was enhanced during collaborative document editing.
Cursor and ruler display was fixed after loading file versions and accepting all changes in review mode.
Page numbering configuration was fixed in documents.
The display of edited data when switching between the document view and review tabs was stabilized.
The generation of printed form was stabilized.
By improving the processing of headers, footers, and comments, the creation of a new document version from a file was stabilized.
The capability for collaborative work on a document from different nodes was improved.
